title: Nefertiti Neck Lift
tagline: Elevate Your Jawline. Smooth the Neck.
description: Targeted botulinum toxin relaxes platysma bands, tightens the jawline border, and creates the elegant neck of a queen.
longDescription: Named after the legendary Egyptian queen, the Nefertiti Lift releases downward pull from the platysma muscles while subtly lifting the jawline. We map every band and inject micro-doses of toxin along the jaw and neck to refine contour, soften wrinkles, and keep your profile poised.

seo.metaTitle: Nefertiti Lift London | Non-Surgical Neck Lift | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Sharpen your jawline and smooth neck lines with the Nefertiti Lift. Doctor-only botulinum toxin technique for elegant lower-face definition.

hero.headline: Frame Your Face with a Sculpted Neck
hero.subheadline: Doctor-led Nefertiti Lift smooths vertical bands and lifts the jawline in 15 minutes.

overview.title: How It Works
overview.content: We inject micro-doses of botulinum toxin along the platysma bands and jawline border. This relaxes downward pull, allowing your natural lift to shine. The jaw looks sharper, necklace lines soften, and makeup sits beautifully.
highlights: Pairs with radiofrequency or filler for extra lift

items.title: Consultant technique
items.description: Performed by doctors experienced with lower-face anatomy.

items.title: Precision mapping
items.description: Custom dosing for each platysma band.

items.title: Seamless maintenance
items.description: Appointment reminders so results never lapse.

candidacy.title: Ideal Candidates
candidacy.note: Combine with Profound RF or filler for severe laxity.

faq.question: Will it affect swallowing?
faq.answer: No. We target superficial bands only; swallowing muscles remain untouched.

faq.question: How often do I repeat it?

relatedTreatments.title: Skin Boosters
relatedTreatments.description: Hydrate the neck for silky texture.
